message.content:
{"id": "11863", 
"title": "Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "The problem is that the 'Update Test Suite' action does not provide an option to remove items from the test suite.", 
"EB": "Currently, the 'Update Test Suite' action only allows me to add or modify items in the test suite, but does not provide any functionality to remove existing items.", 
"SR": "The expected behavior is that the 'Update Test Suite' action should allow me to remove items from the test suite in addition to adding or modifying them."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'What the action actually does is RECREATE the test suite based on the selectionin the dialog.I do an update on a test suite which contains X. '}
